summary: Completed comprehensive testing of NESR Safety Inspection Tool. Backend API and AI analysis working excellently. Frontend upload, analysis, and reporting features all functional. GPT-4o Vision integration successfully detecting safety violations.

minor_issues.issue: CORS headers not fully configured in response
minor_issues.impact: No functional impact - API works correctly

design_issues.issue: Console warnings about missing aria-describedby for accessibility

passed_tests: Backend API /api/ endpoint returns healthy response
Backend API /api/analyze endpoint accepts image_base64 and file_name
AI analysis returns violations, riskLevel, safetyScore correctly
Upload dropzone renders with correct data-testid='upload-dropzone'
Select Photos button with data-testid='upload-button' is clickable
Photo cards appear in gallery with data-testid='analysis-gallery'
Photo detail modal opens when clicking photo card
Notes functionality works in detail modal
Flag functionality works to flag photos
Generate Report button with data-testid='generate-report-button' is enabled
Complete image upload and analysis workflow functional
GPT-4o Vision AI integration working perfectly

success_percentage.frontend: 95% (all core features working - minor accessibility warnings)
